title: Emergency System Restore: Fix Blank Screen and Rebuild AXON SOVEREIGN Application

requirements.text: Fix all syntax errors causing blank screen by ensuring every curly brace { } and square bracket [ ] is properly closed throughout the codebase

quotes: Clear all syntax errors and ensure every { } bracket and [ ] array is properly closed.

acceptanceCriteria: Application loads without blank screen
No console errors related to syntax
All code blocks have matching opening and closing brackets

requirements.text: Implement Single Page Application (SPA) structure with two main view sections: <div id='auth-page'> for authentication and <div id='dashboard-page' style='display:none'> for the dashboard, toggling visibility based on authentication state

quotes: Use a Single Page Application (SPA) structure: Define two main sections: <div id='auth-page'> and <div id='dashboard-page' style='display:none'>.

acceptanceCriteria: App uses two main div sections with IDs 'auth-page' and 'dashboard-page'
Only one section is visible at a time
Dashboard page is hidden by default on initial load
View switching is handled through display style property

requirements.text: Restore the glassmorphic login panel with a 'Full Name' registration field matching the design shown in images (4).jpeg

quotes: Re-inject the glassmorphic login panel with the 'Full Name' registration field.

acceptanceCriteria: Login panel uses glassmorphism styling
Registration form includes Full Name field
Visual design matches reference image images (4).jpeg
Panel displays on auth-page section

requirements.text: Fix registration flow to save user data to 'localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER' and immediately set the view to 'dashboard' without any intermediate steps

quotes: Ensure registration saves to 'localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER' and IMMEDIATELY sets 'view' to 'dashboard'.

acceptanceCriteria: Registration saves to localStorage key 'AXON_MASTER_USER'
Dashboard view displays immediately after successful registration
No loading states or delays between registration and dashboard display
User data persists across page refreshes

requirements.text: Restore dashboard sidebar navigation with five sections: Command Center, Neural Lab, Sentinel Protocol, Device Sync, and Vault, matching the layout shown in sc.png and the reference video

quotes: NAVIGATION: Sidebar with [Command Center, Neural Lab, Sentinel Protocol, Device Sync, Vault].

acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar contains exactly five navigation items in order
Navigation items match reference design from sc.png
Each section is clickable and navigates to appropriate view
Active section is visually indicated

requirements.text: Implement KPI row with three components: Asset Shield displaying ₹1,241,310 with live incrementing ticker, Neural Ingest with link input field, and Vocal Health gauge

quotes: KPI ROW: Asset Shield (₹1,241,310+ ticker), Neural Ingest (Link input), and Vocal Health gauge.

acceptanceCriteria: Asset Shield displays starting value of ₹1,241,310 in Indian Rupee format
Asset Shield value increments automatically in real-time
Neural Ingest includes a text input field for links
Vocal Health displays as a visual gauge component
All three components are positioned in a horizontal row

requirements.text: Add real-time animating Waveform visualization labeled 'Live Spectral Analysis' in the center of the dashboard

quotes: CENTER: Real-time animating Waveform (Live Spectral Analysis) and Synopsis Engine.

acceptanceCriteria: Waveform renders in the center dashboard area
Animation runs continuously in real-time
Component is labeled 'Live Spectral Analysis'
Waveform uses smooth, fluid animation

requirements.text: Add Synopsis Engine component in the center of the dashboard alongside the waveform visualization

quotes: CENTER: Real-time animating Waveform (Live Spectral Analysis) and Synopsis Engine.

acceptanceCriteria: Synopsis Engine displays in center dashboard area
Component is positioned near or with the waveform
Synopsis Engine has distinct visual identity

requirements.text: Add three-tier subscription pricing cards under the Vault section with Free, ₹299/month, and ₹499/month tiers

quotes: PRICING: The 3-tier subscription cards (Free, ₹299, ₹499) under the Vault section.

acceptanceCriteria: Vault section contains three subscription cards
Tiers are priced at Free, ₹299, and ₹499
Pricing displays in Indian Rupee format with /month suffix
Cards are visually distinct and comparable

requirements.text: Display the registered user's Full Name dynamically in the dashboard sidebar, removing any hardcoded 'Nishant' references

quotes: On the dashboard sidebar, dynamically display the 'Full Name' of the user who just registered.

acceptanceCriteria: User's Full Name from registration displays in sidebar
Name updates dynamically based on logged-in user
No hardcoded names like 'Nishant' appear anywhere
Name is retrieved from localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER

requirements.text: Add a Logout button to the dashboard that clears the session from localStorage and returns the view to 'auth-page'

quotes: Add a 'Logout' button that clears the session and returns the view to 'auth-page'.

acceptanceCriteria: Logout button is visible in the dashboard
Clicking logout clears localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER
View switches to auth-page after logout
User must re-authenticate after logout

requirements.text: Implement login validation that displays an 'Invalid Credentials' toast notification when login fails

quotes: If the Login fails, show the 'Invalid Credentials' toast.

acceptanceCriteria: Failed login attempts trigger validation
Toast notification displays with text 'Invalid Credentials'
Toast appears on screen temporarily and dismisses
User remains on auth-page after failed login

requirements.text: Implement secret bypass feature: clicking the 'AXON' logo 3 times immediately force-shows the Dashboard, sets the user as 'Sovereign Administrator', and unlocks the ₹499 subscription plan

quotes: SECRET BYPASS: If I click the 'AXON' logo 3 times, immediately force-show the Dashboard and set the user as 'Sovereign Administrator' with the ₹499 plan unlocked.

acceptanceCriteria: AXON logo tracks click count
After exactly 3 clicks, dashboard view displays immediately
User identity is set to 'Sovereign Administrator'
Subscription tier is set to ₹499 plan
Bypass works from auth-page without requiring credentials
Click counter resets after successful bypass or timeout

constraints: Must preserve existing backend/main.mo actor architecture

Must not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Must use localStorage for authentication state management as specified
Must use Indian Rupee (₹) currency format for all pricing
Pricing tiers must be exactly Free, ₹299, and ₹499 as specified
nonGoals: Backend API integration for authentication (using localStorage instead)
Actual audio processing for waveform (simulation acceptable)
Multi-page routing (using SPA with view toggling instead)
